nodes.text: The Salissian special forces were a group of Salissians that were hired by Magistrate Passel Argente to fight for the Corporate Alliance's Policy Administration Directorate. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, both the Salissian special forces and the Corporate Alliance sided with the Confederacy.

The Salissians special forces were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Salissian mercenaries appeared in the 2004 novel MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry.
